channel.title: TKO Group on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TKO Group on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Paramount Nabs UFC Rights in Major $7.7 Billion Deal, MMA Events to Peel Off From ESPN in 2026
item.description: David Ellison, the new CEO of Paramount, pinned a major new deal for the media company he’s taken over. Paramount Skydance on Monday announced a seven-year media rights agreement with TKO Group
